improveItemPerformance.desc:: Improves item entiy performance, significantly reduing their overhead. default: true

highlightitems.desc:: Choose if nearby reported stacked item entities should be glowing, default: true

reportThreshold.desc:: Set the min amount of stacked items being reported, default: 200

autoremovethreshold.desc:: Set the amount of stacked items being automatically removed, stacks of items only get removed after waiting the reportInterval after first detection. If the stacks exceed the autoremoval threshold by x3 they are instantly removed. default: 400

reportInterval.desc:: Set the amount of seconds between repeated notifications, : default: 180

chatnotification.desc:: Set the chat notification type, one of these: PLAYER(closest player), EVERYONE(all players), NONE, OP(operator). default: PLAYER
